summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5478 for the improvement of Eyres Place, from West McGraw Street to Montavista Place (formerly the alley between Blocks 47, 48 and 49, Carleton Park Addition), by paving and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 69854 as amended by Ordinance No. 70044, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
